dct_title_s: Facies Palæstinæ ex monumentis veteribus descripta
dct_description_sm: ab Hadriano Relando ; recusa ab Christoph. Weigelio.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Milliaria romana" and "Horae itineris".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, places of historical interest.
Features a decorative title cartouche with illustrations of God and coins.
Appears in Christophor the Elder Weigel's Descriptio orbis antiqui. Nuernberg : Johann David Koehler, 1720.
